name: Tribefort
description:
In Tribefort, you fight for survival on a vast island. Explore the lands to gather information. Mine and gather resources that you will need for your base. Farm and keep animals to survive. Strategize to win over your opponents.

In this game you can play against many other players in two or more teams.
Either host a server from the game client or create a dedicated server.
Over 70 different achievements.


You will need to gather resources to survive. Mine ores, chop down trees, find treasure chests, pick herbs and food.


To survive in the wilderness you will need to have enough food. Grow crops to keep you and your team healthy.


Craft items, weapons and armor. Get an advantage over your opponents by advancing in technology and gain access to better material and items.


Build your base and protect it from enemies. Build walls, farms, furnaces, storage, anvils etc.


Make sure to plan for the night. Prepare with torches, clothes and food to survive.


The island consists of many different biomes, each with its own properties. Each map is randomly generated. Explore the lands and adapt to the environment.
